13  package net.sf.oval.internal.util;
14  
15  import java.lang.ref.SoftReference;
16  import java.util.HashMap;
17  import java.util.LinkedList;
18  import java.util.Map;
19  
20  /**
21   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
22   */
23  public class ObjectCache<K, V>
24  {
25  	private final Map<K, SoftReference<V>> map = new HashMap<K, SoftReference<V>>();
26  
27  	private final LinkedList<V> objectsLastAccessed = new LinkedList<V>();
28  	private final int objectsToKeepCount;
29  
30  	/**
31  	 * Creates a new cache keeping all objects.
32  	 */
33  	public ObjectCache()
34  	{
35  		objectsToKeepCount = -1;
36  	}
37  
38  	/**
39  	 * @param maxObjectsToKeep the number of cached objects that should stay in memory when GC 
40  	 * starts removing SoftReferences to free memory 
41  	 */
42  	public ObjectCache(final int maxObjectsToKeep)
43  	{
44  		this.objectsToKeepCount = maxObjectsToKeep;
45  	}
46  
47  	public void compact()
48  	{
49  		for (final Map.Entry<K, SoftReference<V>> entry : map.entrySet())
50  		{
51  			final SoftReference<V> ref = entry.getValue();
52  			if (ref.get() == null)
53  			{
54  				map.remove(entry.getKey());
55  			}
56  		}
57  	}
58  
59  	public boolean contains(final K key)
60  	{
61  		return map.containsKey(key);
62  	}
63  
64  	public V get(final K key)
65  	{
66  		final SoftReference<V> softReference = map.get(key);
67  		if (softReference != null)
68  		{
69  			final V value = softReference.get();
70  
71  			if (value == null)
72  			{
73  				map.remove(key);
74  			}
75  			else if (objectsToKeepCount > 0 && value != objectsLastAccessed.getFirst())
76  			{
77  				objectsLastAccessed.remove(value);
78  				objectsLastAccessed.addFirst(value);
79  				if (objectsLastAccessed.size() > objectsToKeepCount)
80  				{
81  					objectsLastAccessed.removeLast();
82  				}
83  			}
84  			return softReference.get();
85  		}
86  		return null;
87  	}
88  
89  	public void put(final K key, final V value)
90  	{
91  		map.remove(key);
92  		map.put(key, new SoftReference<V>(value));
93  	}
94  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
